long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:

Our apps employ advanced encryption technologies like OpenVPN or the IKEv2 protocol (for mobile devices), providing comprehensive device security.

Key features of our best free VPN browser extension for India include:

★ Unlimited Access to Internet Resources:
Gain seamless access to a wide array of websites and online services with a single click. Choose from a variety of Indian servers to navigate content barriers effortlessly.

★ Regional Content Access:
Utilize our VPN's regional servers to virtually relocate to any city in India. Select your preferred VPN server and explore online content with ease.

★ Secure Browsing of Sensitive Content:
Ensure complete anonymity and added data protection while browsing sensitive websites. Your privacy remains intact with our free VPN service for India.

★ Completely Free:
Experience secure internet access without any cost. We are dedicated to providing free and secure VPN access to all users.

Why Opt for Planet VPN Lite for India?
Our best free VPN service for India excels as the leading free, unlimited VPN and proxy service for Chrome users, offering secure internet access worldwide. With state-of-the-art technologies and robust encryption methods, accessing any online resource becomes effortless.
